project_abstract.cdata: The central aim of the project is to contribute to improved learning at the lower middle school level by providing for better teaching services, including instructional methodology, teacher training and management of teacher training and assignment.  The project will assist China's efforts to strengthen lower middle school teaching nationwide by providing for development of teaching services in 15 provinces and autonomous regions, focusing on 124 teacher training institutions and on provincial and county education bureaus.  It will thereby focus on a critical segment of the education system, lower middle school teaching services, and will consist of three major elements:  institution, management and quality enhancement.  The institutional element will address operational needs at the teacher training institutions through facilities upgrading, provision of instructional equipment, spares and consumables, library development, and staff upgrading. The management element will develop general teaching system management capabilities at the central, provincial and institutional levels through staff training and specialist services.  The quality enhancement element will include teaching methodology core seminars, pilot programs and innovation programs.

P003567.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>师范教育发展项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的中心目标是通过提供更好的教学服务，包括教学方法、教师培训以及教师培训和分配管理，帮助提高初中学校学生的学习成绩。项目将协助中国努力加强全国初中教学，为此将以124个教师培训机构以及省教育厅和县教育局为重点，推动发展15个省区的教学服务。因此，项目将侧重向初中这一教育系统关键组成部分提供教学服务，为此将设机构、管理和质量提升三个子项目。机构子项目将通过设施升级改造、教学设备、零部件和耗材提供、图书馆建设以及人员素质提升等措施满足教师培训机构的运营需求。管理子项目将通过人员培训和专家服务，建立中央、省级和机构层面的总体教学系统管理能力。质量提升子项目内容包括教学方法研讨会、试点和创新。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
